title: Урология и андрология
description:
The Department of Urology of the Volyn Hospital specializes in the fields of traditional urology, andrology, neuro-urology, oncourology, plastic urology, endourology, X-ray urology. The emphasis in the treatment of patients is made on minimally invasive and organ-saving treatment methods. Complex and unique surgeries are performed, such as laparoscopic intestinal ureteroplasty, laparoscopic cystectomy, percutaneous nephrolitholapaxy of coral stones, as well as surgery for oncological diseases. The Medical and Diagnostic Center for Men's Health was created to address a wide range of male urogenital problems, including prostatitis, prostate adenoma, prostate cancer, urolithiasis, varicocele, male infertility, erectile dysfunction and others. Complex treatment: from unique hardware techniques to various endoscopic and minimally invasive surgeries. Hospitalization in the urology department of the Volyn hospital is possible both on a planned and emergency basis.

The Clinical Hospital No. 1 of the Office of the President of the Russian Federation (Volynskaya) is a large medical complex consisting of more than two dozen inpatient departments of a surgical and therapeutic profile, several medical and diagnostic departments, and clinics with more than forty specialized rooms.
